.. py:module:: wgertrainer.display_equipment_table


Module Contents

Functions
~~~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   wgertrainer.display_equipment_table.display_equipment_table



.. py:function:: display_equipment_table()

   Fetches equipment data from the API and displays it as a table.
